overview: "From the Ayiti of the Indians to the liberation war which led to the independence of Haiti, this documentary tells us about the various fights that men have waged on this land in order to free it from the yoke of servitude. . From Caonabo to Toussaint Louverture, beyond the struggles of races or colors, these men fought for Universal Freedom and Equality ... A historical documentary to better understand the birth of Haiti, the passage of servitude to independence."
title: L'arbre de la Liberté
